page.title: 15Village Life (cont.)
page.content: {3.The Gun Club.} Young and old people, mostly men, belong to the Gun club. Usually 12 bore shotguns are used. There are two sheds at Castle Camps Gun club. One stores all the clays,the other stores traps. The ground is about 2 acres. There is a well which is perhaps 200 feet deep. We shoot clay Pigeons. There are different kinds of clays. There is a Batton,a flourescent large one, a black one, a mini one and a Bolting rabbit. A trap can fire 4 clays. I sometimes go and help fire the traps. by Dominic.
